mapper.sql: id, name, label, parentid, is_show, orderby, is_leaf
mapper.select: -- `cte` is an alias for the result of WITH clause WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( -- get root node whose id is a variable SELECT * FROM course_category WHERE id = #{id} -- merge the recursive result to `cte` UNION ALL -- recursive operation SELECT child.* FROM course_category child INNER JOIN cte parent ON child.parentid = parent.id ) -- select all from virtual table `cte` and sort the records by column `id` and `orderby` SELECT * FROM cte ORDER BY cte.id, cte.orderby
